definitions.usage: 指指导运动员或运动团队的人，通常负责训练、战术安排和激励队员。

examples.scene: 在一场紧张的篮球比赛前，球队在更衣室里听取指导，准备应对对手的策略。
examples.chineseIdea: 指导者正在激励队员，告诉他们如何在比赛中发挥最佳水平。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The @ @ gave a motivational speech to boost the team’s morale before the game.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The 「head coach」 gave a motivational speech to boost the team’s morale before the game.
examples.chineseTranslation: 「主教练」在比赛前发表了一场激励人心的演讲，以提升团队士气。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The coach leader said a speech to make team excited.' 纠正：'The head coach gave a motivational speech to boost the team’s morale.'

examples.scene: 在一个社区足球俱乐部，指导者正在教年轻球员如何踢任意球。
examples.chineseIdea: 指导者通过示范和反复练习，帮助队员掌握技术。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The @ @ @ worked with the young players to improve their free-kick skills.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The 「assistant coach」 worked with the young players to improve their free-kick skills.
examples.chineseTranslation: 「助理教练」与年轻球员一起训练，提高他们的任意球技术。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The help coach teach kids kick ball.' 纠正：'The assistant coach worked with the young players to improve their free-kick skills.'

definitions.usage: 指在学术、职业或个人发展方面提供指导的人，通常通过一对一的辅导帮助他人实现目标。

examples.scene: 一位职场新人感到迷茫，决定找一位专业人士帮助规划职业道路。
examples.chineseIdea: 指导者帮助客户设定目标并制定实现目标的计划。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The @ @ helped her set clear goals for her professional development.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The 「career coach」 helped her set clear goals for her professional development.
examples.chineseTranslation: 「职业教练」帮助她为职业发展设定清晰的目标。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The job teacher give her advice for work.' 纠正：'The career coach helped her set clear goals for her professional development.'

examples.scene: 一个人想要改变生活方式，找到一位指导者来帮助调整日常习惯。
examples.chineseIdea: 指导者通过倾听和建议，帮助客户找到生活的平衡。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Her @ @ encouraged her to prioritize self-care and mindfulness.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Her 「life coach」 encouraged her to prioritize self-care and mindfulness.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她的「人生教练」鼓励她优先考虑自我关怀和正念。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The life teacher tell her to care herself.' 纠正：'Her life coach encouraged her to prioritize self-care and mindfulness.'

definitions.usage: 指用于长途旅行的舒适型巴士，通常比普通公交车更豪华，配备舒适的座椅和空调。

examples.scene: 一群学生计划去另一个城市参加文化节，学校安排了一辆车供他们使用。
examples.chineseIdea: 这辆车为长途旅行提供舒适的座位和便利。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The students decided to @ @ @ to save money on their trip.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The students decided to 「travel by coach」 to save money on their trip.
examples.chineseTranslation: 学生们决定「乘坐长途巴士」以节省旅行费用。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The students take big bus to go trip.' 纠正：'The students decided to travel by coach to save money on their trip.'

examples.scene: 一家旅游公司宣传他们的服务，强调车辆的舒适性和准时性。
examples.chineseIdea: 公司提供高质量的交通工具，吸引游客选择他们的服务。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The company advertised its @ @ for group tours across the country.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The company advertised its 「luxury coach」 for group tours across the country.
examples.chineseTranslation: 该公司宣传其「豪华长途巴士」用于全国团体旅游。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The company say they have fancy bus.' 纠正：'The company advertised its luxury coach for group tours across the country.'
